summary: VEHICLE WAS STATIONARY, I CLOSED THE FRONT DRIVER DOOR AND THE LATCH BROKE AND THE DOOR WOULD NOT STAY CLOSED. I HAD TO PHYSICALLY HOLD THE DOOR SHUT WHILE DRIVING UNTIL IT WAS REPAIRED AT A COST OF OVER 400 DOLLARS. I NOTICED THIS PART HAS BEEN RECALLED ON THE 2013 AND 2014 MODELS. ANY CHANCE THAT THE 2011 MODELS WILL BE INCLUDED IN THIS RECALL?
